19  explicit ShmData(ShmType t, const std::string &name=std::string())
20  : name(name)
21  , m_refcount(0)
22  , shmtype(t)
23  {}
24 
25  ~ShmData() {
26  assert(m_refcount == 0);
27  }
28 
29  int ref() const {
30  assert(m_refcount >= 0);
31  return ++m_refcount;
32  }
33 
34  int unref() const {
35  assert(m_refcount > 0);
36  return --m_refcount;
37  }
38 
39  int refcount() const {
40  assert(m_refcount >= 0);
41  return m_refcount;
42  }
